Package com.joliciel.talismane.utils

Basic development utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Monitorable
    A class whose progress can be monitored using a ProgressMonitor.
    ObjectCache
    A cache for storing objects so they don't have to be reloaded multiple times from a datastore.
    PersistentList<E>
    A List representing dependent objects stored in the database.
    PersistentSet<E>
    A List representing dependent objects stored in the database.
    ProgressMonitor
    Used for monitoring progress of tasks, so that percent complete and current action can be displayed to the user in a multi-threaded environment.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayListNoNulls<E>  
    BoundedHashMap<K,V>
    A HashMap with a bounded number of entries.
    BoundedHashSet<E>
    A HashSet with a bounded number of entries.
    BoundedTreeMap<K,V>
    A TreeMap with a bounded number of entries.
    BoundedTreeSet<E>
    A treeset with a bounded number of elements.
    CoNLLFormatter  
    CountedOutcome<T>
    An outcome/value pair that orders automatically in descending order (from highest to lowest count).
    CSVFile
    A class allowing us to extract information from a CSV file.
    CSVFormatter
    Various utilities for formatting text to CSV and reading out of a CSV file.
    DaoUtils
    Various generic data access utilities.
    LogUtils
    Various generic logging utilities.
    MessageResource
    A simple container for resources that can be formatted, including a getter for the resource key and a getter for the Object[] that will replace placeholders.
    MultiTaskProgressMonitor
    Used for monitoring progress of a thread.
    PerformanceMonitor
    Monitors the performance of various sub-tasks within an application run.
    Configuration file keys:
    talismane.monitoring.activated=true/false : whether the entire system is activated (default = false) talismane.monitoring.default=true/false : whether individual monitors are active by default talismane.monitor.[package name] : whether this whole package is active by default - sub-packages override parent package settings for their classes talismane.monitor.[package + class name] : whether this specific class is active
    PersistentListImpl<E>
    The default implementation of PersistentList
    PersistentSetImpl<E>
    The default implementation of PersistentSet
    RegexUtils
    Various generic utilities for use with patterns and regexes.
    SimpleObjectCache
    A default implementation for ObjectCache.
    SimpleProgressMonitor
    Used for monitoring progress of a thread.
    StringUtils
    Various generic utilities for use with Strings.
    WeightedOutcome<T>
    An outcome/value pair that orders automatically in descending order (from highest to lowest weight).
    WeightedOutcomeAscendingComparator<T>
    Orders weighted outcomes from lowest to highest value, if you happen, for some bizarre reason to be interested in the lower-weight values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DaoUtils.LogLevel  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JolicielException
    An exception specific to generic Joliciel functionality.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.utils Description

Basic development utilities.
